item.title: 空客计划重组太空系统，合并谈判仍在继续
item.description: 业内消息人士称，空中客车公司正在为其太空系统业务制定新的扭亏计划，并就潜在的欧洲合并进行谈判，以抵御包括意大利莱昂纳多公司和法国泰雷兹公司在内的竞争对手。【原文：Airbus is drawing up a new turnaround plan for its Space Systems business, industry sources said, adding talks over potential European consolidation to fend off competition include Italy's Leonardo as well as France's Thales.】

item.title: 特斯拉一跃取代福特，成为摩根士丹利在美国汽车行业的 "最佳选择
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）将特斯拉评为美国汽车行业 "最有价值汽车制造商"，取代福特汽车，特斯拉股价周一大涨近 6%。【原文：Tesla shares jumped nearly 6% on Monday after Morgan Stanley named the most valuable automaker its "top pick" in the U.S. automotive industry, replacing Ford .】

item.title: 贴现窗口改革法案出台，美联储正着手自身改革
item.description: 美联储正在努力全面改革一项关键的紧急贷款机制，银行历来对此感到焦虑，现在国会也可能采取行动。【原文：Federal Reserve efforts to overhaul a key emergency lending facility historically viewed with anxiety by banks are now being joined by potential congressional action.】

item.title: 分析师称，大型视频游戏发行商在罢工期间受到内部工作室的保护
item.description: 分析师说，由于电子艺界和 Take-Two 等大型视频游戏发行商都有自己的工作室，而且游戏开发周期较长，因此它们很可能不会因配音演员和动作捕捉艺术家罢工而遭受重创。【原文：Major video game publishers including Electronic Arts and Take-Two will likely stave off a big hit from the strike by voice actors and motion-capture artists due to their in-house studios and the lengthy development cycles for games, analysts said.】

item.title: 消息人士称，惠普将无条件获得欧盟批准 140 亿美元的瞻博网络交易
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，惠普企业公司（HPE）以 140 亿美元收购网络设备制造商瞻博网络（Juniper Networks）的交易有望获得欧盟无条件的反垄断批准。【原文：Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) is expected to secure unconditional EU antitrust approval for its $14 billion acquisition of networking gear maker Juniper Networks , people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 丰田董事长警告称，如果投资者支持率继续下降，他可能会失去董事会席位
item.description: 据周一发表的一篇采访报道，丰田汽车公司董事长丰田章男表示，如果股东对他的支持率继续以今年的速度下降，他可能不会连任董事。【原文：Toyota Motor Chairman Akio Toyoda said he may not be reelected as a director if shareholder support for him continues to fall at the pace it did this year, according to an interview published on Monday.】

item.title: 保费和投资收益强劲，Loews 盈利增加；任命新首席执行官
item.description: Loews 周一表示，在执掌公司 25 年后，James Tisch 将把首席执行官一职移交给自己的儿子。该公司还报告称，由于保险费上涨和投资回报率提高，季度利润跃升了 2.5%。【原文：Loews said on Monday that James Tisch will hand over the CEO role to his son after 25 years at the helm. The company also reported a 2.5% jump in its quarterly profit, helped by a rise in insurance premiums and higher returns on its investments.】

item.title: 消费放缓，麦当劳季度全球销售额意外下降
item.description: 麦当劳周一公布的季度全球可比销售额意外下降，原因是这家汉堡巨头竭力阻止预算紧张的顾客选择在家里吃更便宜的餐点。【原文：McDonald's reported a surprise drop in quarterly global comparable sales on Monday, as the burger giant struggled to hold back budget-strapped customers from opting for cheaper meals at home.】

item.title: 西方石油公司将以 8.18 亿美元向二叠纪资源公司出售特拉华盆地部分资产
item.description: 美国石油和天然气生产商西方石油公司（Occidental Petroleum）周一表示，由于计划削减债务，该公司将以约8.18亿美元的价格向二叠纪资源公司（Permian Resources）出售德克萨斯州和新墨西哥州特拉华盆地的部分资产。【原文：U.S. oil and gas producer Occidental Petroleum said on Monday it would sell certain Delaware Basin assets in Texas and New Mexico to Permian Resources for about $818 million, as it plans to cut down debt.】

item.title: 人工智能回报缓慢引发担忧，微软成本成焦点
item.description: 本周二，微软将公布财报，届时投资者将面临一个重大问题：Azure 云计算业务的增长是否足以证明在人工智能基础设施上投入数十亿美元是合理的？【原文：Microsoft investors will have one big question when the tech giant reports earnings on Tuesday: has growth in its Azure cloud-computing business picked up enough to justify the billions of dollars being spent on artificial intelligence infrastructure?】

item.title: 特朗普发表支持比特币的讲话后，在美国上市的加密货币股票大涨
item.description: 在共和党总统候选人唐纳德-特朗普大谈比特币并承诺对该行业实施更友好的监管之后，在纽约上市的加密货币公司的股票在周一开盘前上涨。【原文：Shares of New York-listed cryptocurrency firms gained before the open on Monday after Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump talked up bitcoin and promised friendlier regulation for the industry.】

item.title: 美国平静了，但能平静多久？
item.description: 欧洲、中东和非洲地区金融和市场突发新闻记者 Alun John 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets by Alun John, EMEA breaking news correspondent, finance and markets】

item.title: 本周美联储宣判、大型科技公司业绩预期，期货上涨
item.description: 周一，美国股指期货在近期市场溃败后攀升，投资者为繁忙的一周做好准备，本周将迎来美联储利率决议、翘首以盼的科技公司财报和重要的劳动力数据。【原文：U.S. index futures climbed on Monday after the recent market rout, as investors girded up for a busy week marked by a Federal Reserve interest-rate decision, eagerly awaited tech earnings and crucial labor data.】

item.title: 美联储可能最后一次维持利率稳定，通胀之战压轴上演
item.description: 预计美联储将在本周举行的为期两天的政策会议上维持利率稳定，但承认通胀率已接近美国央行 2% 的目标，从而为最快在 9 月份降息敞开大门。【原文：The Federal Reserve is expected to hold interest rates steady at a two-day policy meeting this week but open the door to interest rate cuts as soon as September by acknowledging inflation has edged nearer to the U.S. central bank's 2% target.】

item.title: 解说员：美联储在经历物价上涨的惩罚性冲击后接近 2% 的解决方案
item.description: 通胀率已接近美联储 2% 的目标，预计央行最快将于 9 月份开始降息。【原文：Inflation is nearing the Federal Reserve's 2% target, and the central bank is expected to begin cutting interest rates as soon as September.】

item.title: RSV 疫苗生产商争夺注射第二年的市场份额
item.description: 本周晚些时候，辉瑞公司、葛兰素史克公司和 Moderna 公司将公布财报，届时华尔街将关注它们在新型呼吸道合胞病毒（RSV）疫苗方面的竞争。【原文：Pfizer's , GSK's and Moderna's competition for arms for their new respiratory syncytial virus (RSV) vaccines is on Wall Street's watch list for when the companies report earnings later this week.】

item.title: 美国收益率曲线接近翻转，衰退信号尚无定论
item.description: 历史上持续时间最长、程度最深的美国国债收益率曲线倒挂可能已接近尾声，这是债券市场即将出现衰退的一个关键信号。【原文：The longest and deepest U.S. Treasury yield curve inversion in history, a key bond market signal of an upcoming recession, could be nearing its end.】

item.title: 美股动荡使大科技公司的估值成为焦点
item.description: 美国股市的暴跌使人们更加关注英伟达（Nvidia）和微软（Microsoft）等科技公司的估值，这些公司在今年大部分时间里推动市场走高。【原文：A bruising selloff in U.S. stocks is putting a sharper focus on valuations of the tech names such as Nvidia and Microsoft that have driven markets higher for most of this year.】

item.title: 独家报道必和必拓埃斯孔迪达煤矿工会敦促拒绝合同提议，可能举行罢工
item.description: 必和必拓公司位于智利的埃斯孔迪达矿是世界上最大的铜矿，该矿工会主席表示，工会呼吁其近2400名会员拒绝公司提出的最终合同，并准备罢工。【原文：The union at BHP's Escondida mine in Chile, the world's largest copper mine, has called on its nearly 2,400 members to reject a final contract offer from the company and prepare for a strike, the union president said.】

item.title: 德国反垄断机构为大众与里维拉的合资企业开绿灯
item.description: 德国竞争管理机构周一表示，德国大众汽车公司和美国电动汽车制造商 Rivian Automotive 可能组建合资企业。【原文：Germany's Volkswagen and U.S electric car maker Rivian Automotive may form a joint venture, the German competition authority said on Monday.】

item.title: 对冲基金的流动 高盛称，对冲基金以十年来最快速度放弃看跌欧洲的押注
item.description: 路透社周一看到的一份高盛（Goldman Sachs）给客户的说明显示，在一系列公司业绩好于预期的情况下，全球对冲基金以十年来最快的速度放弃了对欧洲股市的押注。【原文：Global hedge funds ditched bets against European stock markets at the fastest pace in 10 years amid a raft of better-than-expected company results, according to a Goldman Sachs note to clients seen by Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 雅培股价在审判判决后下滑，竞争对手利洁时受到拖累
item.description: 雅培制药公司股价盘前下跌近 7%，而英国同行利洁时公司周一暴跌 9%，此前这家美国医疗保健公司被勒令支付 4.95 亿美元的赔偿金，赔偿金与该公司生产的早产儿配方奶粉有关。【原文：Abbott Laboratories' shares fell nearly 7% premarket, while British peer Reckitt Benckiser slumped 9% on Monday, after the U.S. healthcare firm was ordered to pay $495 million in damages related to its formula for premature infants.】

item.title: 七月中国制造业活动继续下滑：路透社民意调查
item.description: 路透社周一的一项民意调查显示，7月份中国工厂活动可能连续第三个月萎缩，这使人们继续预期，由于长期的房地产危机和就业不稳定拖累经济增长，中国政府将需要进一步释放刺激政策。【原文：China's factory activity likely shrank for a third month in July, a Reuters poll showed on Monday, keeping alive expectations officials will need to release further stimulus as a protracted property crisis and job insecurity drag on growth.】

item.title: BetMGM 预计 NFL 赛季将进一步促进收入增长
item.description: 美国体育博彩服务公司BetMGM周一表示，预计今年下半年乃至2025年的收入将有所增长，这主要得益于希望在美国国家橄榄球联盟（NFL）赛季中套现的投注者的需求。【原文：U.S. sports-betting service BetMGM said on Monday it expects revenue to grow in the second half of the year and into 2025, banking on demand from punters looking to cash in on the National Football League (NFL) season.】

item.title: 日本最高委员会敦促政府和日本央行以日元疲软为导向制定政策
item.description: 日本政府最高经济委员会周一表示，日本政府和央行在指导政策时必须认真考虑近期日元疲软对消费造成的损害。【原文：Japan's government and central bank must guide policy by taking into careful consideration recent yen weakness that is hurting consumption, the government's top economic council said on Monday.】

item.title: 帝亚吉欧将在 COVID 后首次出现年度销售额下滑
item.description: 下周，帝亚吉欧将公布自 2020 年以来的首次年度销售下滑，届时它需要让投资者相信，其扭转北美和拉美业务的计划正在取得进展。【原文：Diageo is set to post its first yearly sales decline since 2020 next week, when it needs to convince investors that plans to turn around its North American and Latin American businesses are showing progress.】

item.title: 台湾第二季度经济增长放缓，但受人工智能热潮支撑：路透社民调
item.description: 路透社周一的一项民意调查显示，尽管对人工智能技术的高需求推动了强劲的出口，但依赖贸易的台湾第二季度的经济增长可能放缓。【原文：Economic growth in trade-dependent Taiwan probably slowed in the second quarter in spite of robust exports driven by high demand for AI technology, a Reuters poll showed on Monday.】

item.title: 喜力上半年业绩不及预期，股价下滑
item.description: 荷兰啤酒酿造商喜力周一公布的半年营业利润增长了 12.5%，但 6 月和 7 月体育赛事的预期提振作用并未实现，低于分析师预期，导致其股价下跌了 7%。【原文：Dutch brewer Heineken reported a 12.5% rise in half-year operating profit on Monday after an anticipated boost from sporting events in June and July did not materialise, missing analyst estimates and sending its shares down 7%.】

item.title: 受北美订单推动，飞利浦第二季度利润增长
item.description: 飞利浦公司周一公布的第二季度财报超出分析师预期，这主要得益于其在北美的订单量。【原文：Philips reported second-quarter earnings that beat analysts' expectations on Monday, boosted by its order intake in North America.】

item.title: 聚焦：清洁技术领域的特朗普效应加深了欧洲董事会的忧虑
item.description: 由于担心唐纳德-特朗普可能在大选中获胜对其行业的影响，专注于清洁能源的欧洲公司正在放弃扩张计划，为销售额下降做准备，或对美国项目的资金来源产生怀疑。【原文：European companies focused on clean energy are abandoning expansion plans, bracing for lower sales or see funding of U.S projects in doubt because of fears over what a potential election victory for Donald Trump could mean for their sector.】
